t: Super Hits by Clay Aiken (2010) Audio CD - Amazon.com Music
s: I still don't understand how Clay Aiken didn't win American Idol, and this CD really highlights the surprise. After all, who has heard from Ruben Studdard since he won? Nobody. This is a great album and it really showcases Clay's amazing vocals.

t: On My Way Here Clay Aiken Format: Audio CD 886972808925| eBay
Aiken, Clay - A Thousand Different Ways - Amazon.com Music
s: This CD is a Joy to behold! Clay Aiken uses his Signature voice to infuse new life into a selection of 10 popular classic and timeless love songs. He also adds 4 new soon to be classic originals. I must admit that I was concerned with the choice to feature mostly cover songs on this album.

t: Clay Aiken The Way / Solitaire Audio CD ~ 2 Track CD ~ P/O Excellent Condition 828766019926 | eBay
Aiken, Clay - The Way / Solitaire - Amazon.com Music
s: I would have to say, get this CD, put it in, turn off the cell phone, crank up the volume, and just listen to this amazing vocal performance! Makes rush hour so very much better! ... The Way isn't my favourite song on his album, but presumably most people buy this single for Solitaire. If you liked how he sung it on American Idol you will absolutely love this. It's beautifully sung as one would expect from Aiken...
